A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Countless plot holes and cringe worthy moments\,  several annoying child like jokes with terrible timings \, lack of respect for the stablished lore\, legacy characters and veteran fans alike \, an hour long  boring and inconsequential casino plot with a horrible new character (Rose Tico)\, the worst part is that not only it alienated me and my friends from ep ix but of star wars as a whole\, congrats Rian Johnson for ruining star wars by making a poorly written fan fiction canan\, that apparently only you enjoyed. Good luck with that new trilogy because no one will care about it.
